### [Base Types](/documentation/kernel/ioreducedblockservices#base-types)

[`IOSCSIPeripheralDeviceNub`](/documentation/kernel/ioscsiperipheraldevicenub)[`IOSCSIPrimaryCommandsDevice`](/documentation/kernel/ioscsiprimarycommandsdevice)[`IOSCSIProtocolServices`](/documentation/kernel/ioscsiprotocolservices)This class defines the public SCSI Protocol Services Layer API for any class that implements SCSI protocol services. A protocol services layer driver is responsible for taking incoming SCSITaskIdentifier objects and translating them to the native command type for the native protocol interface (e.g. SBP-2 ORB on FireWire).[`IOSCSIProtocolInterface`](/documentation/kernel/ioscsiprotocolinterface)This class defines the public SCSI Protocol Layer API for any class that provides Protocol services or needs to provide the Protocol Service API for passing service requests to a Protocol Service driver.
